author: oheger
msg: Added LegacyListDelimiterHandler class.
This is an implementation of ListDelimiterHandler which simulates the behavior
of PropertiesConfiguration in version 1.x. It is intended to be used by
applications that have to deal with configuration files created by the
old version.

author: oheger
msg: The methods for escaping values of ListDelimiterHandler now expects a ValueTransformer.
When escaping single values, AbstractListDelimiterHandler already invokes the
transformer.

author: oheger
msg: Added ValueTransformer interface.
As becomes obvious, collaboration between a Configuration and a
ListDelimiterHandler can be complex when the configuration performs an
additional encoding of values before they are written to disk. This interface
allows the delimiter handler to perform this encoding on behalf of the
configuration.

author: oheger
msg: Added DisabledListDelimiterHandler class.
This is a special implementation of ListDelimiterHandler which does not
support any list splitting. Thus it simulates the mode which was achieved in
the passed by setting the delimiterParsingDisabled property to true.

author: hboutemy
msg: o "Shell command for cleaning older artifacts" is done: I used it to clean dist, and it worked like a charm :)
o added links to last TODO item
